resources.string: You can only have one active account
The following track will start shortly.
Every time you see or hear an advert, artists get paid. Occasional adverts allow us to continue to support artists and keep SoundCloud free for listeners.
Please reopen your app to keep listening
Put a pause on adverts: watch this video and unlock %s minutes of non-stop music
You’ve unlocked your advert-free listening session.
Smile! This image will appear on your profile.
Almost done. Now choose a display name and add a photo to personalise your profile.
Please enter a valid email address.
Oops! An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
There’s a problem with your data connection. Check your network settings.
Your password must be at least 6 characters long.
You must be at least 13 years old.
We couldn’t sign you in. Sure you have the right email and password?
We can’t recover your password right now. Try again soon.
Check your email for instructions about how to change your password.
Something doesn’t sound right. Try signing up at SoundCloud.com.
To create an account, we need your permission for Facebook to share your email with us.
We couldn’t sign you in. Please try again.
We couldn’t sign you in with Google+. To activate your Google+ account and try again, go to plus.google.com.
By selecting \"Continue\", you agree to the Terms of use and Privacy policy of SoundCloud.
Try again soon or sign in using your email address and password.
Enter your email address and we’ll send you a link to change your password. If you still need help, visit our Help Centre.
We couldn’t create an account for you
Our robots think this sign-up looks too much like spam. If you think this is a mistake, contact SoundCloud support.
We’re having some trouble signing you in.
That email address is already associated with an account. Enter a different email address or try signing in.
The domain you have entered seems to not be capable of receiving emails. Did you spell it correctly?
You need to be at least %1$s years old to create an account in this region.
Sorry we couldn’t create an account for you with the details you provided.
Google+ sign in cannot be used without Google Play Services. Please try another sign in method.
Please sign in or sign up to open this link.
This person hasn’t added a profile description yet.
To edit your profile, sign in to SoundCloud on your desktop.
You don’t have any notifications yet.
Follow your favourite artists, bands and podcasts to hear their latest tracks.
Follow your favourite artists, bands and podcasts to hear their latest tracks.
Like your favourite sounds to hear them again.
Follow your favourite artists, bands and curators to hear their latest tracks.
You don’t have any followers yet.
Share your favourite tracks and playlists to build your community
This person isn’t being followed by anyone yet.
This person isn’t following anyone yet.
Couldn’t download content, maybe your connection is down? Pull to try again.
We’re having a problem with your account. Sign back in to SoundCloud to continue using the app.
There was a problem loading that URL.
There was an error cropping your image.
There was a problem processing your request. Please try again soon.
Oops! We couldn’t sign you up\nTry updating the app or sign up at SoundCloud.com.
Please grant SoundCloud access to read your external storage to access your image.
%s has asked us to block your account from following them.
Sorry, only users %1$s years and older are allowed to follow %2$s.
To follow %s, confirm you’re of the required age.
There was a problem loading the image
How would you like to add an image?
We may use your email for updates and tips on SoundCloud’s products and services. You can unsubscribe for free at any time in your notification preferences.
By signing in, you agree to our Terms of use.
Sign up with your email address
Or sign in with your account
Repost status could not be changed
Oops… failed to post comment. Try again later.
An account verification e-mail was sent to the address you signed up with. Please click the link in this e-mail to make comments.
Oops… failed to send e-mail. Try again later.
Check your connection, and tap to try again.
Find some and add them to this playlist
Edit your playlists on the fly
You can now reorder or remove tracks from your playlists

resources.string: Please insert an SD card to record.
Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
You will lose all of your edits. Proceed?
Please grant SoundCloud access to your microphone so we can create a new recording.
Check the spelling or try a different search
Clear the application cache to free up memory on your device
When a playlist ends, play tracks based on the last track
Only update new likes etc. over Wi-Fi
Enabling analytics allows us to collect data about your use of this app, which helps us improve the app. For details, refer to our Privacy Policy.
Enabling crash logs helps us improve the app significantly. We don’t collect any personal data. For details, refer to our Privacy Policy.
Remove all of your saved search terms
You will have to reconnect your SoundCloud account.
You have not liked any station yet
We’re unable to start this station. Try again in a few minutes.
An endless mix of music including %1$s and more
Content on this profile might be inappropriate for those under a certain age.
This information will be saved on your profile.
Tap to cast music to your TV and Cast enabled speakers
Sharing is caring. Invite your friends to experience SoundCloud with you.
Invite friends to listen to your latest track on SoundCloud
Playlists and albums you have liked or created will show up here.
Not all your playlists and albums are being shown. Clear filters to see them all.
There was a problem loading your collection.\nTry again later
Your likes, playlists, albums and stations.\nAll in one place.
Welcome to your new collection, a single destination for your sounds.
Are you sure you want to clear your listening history? You won’t be able to undo this action.
Error clearing your listening history. Try again later.
Find all the tracks you’ve listened to here.
This will permanently delete this playlist. Are you sure you want to continue?
Listen to your likes, playlists & albums offline and ad‑free
Tap into Liked Tracks or Playlists & Albums to download your favourite music to your device.
Tap into Tracks or Playlists & Albums to download your favourite music to your device.
Are you sure you want to clear your recently played? You won’t be able to undo this action.
Error clearing your recently played. Try again later.
Find all your recently played content here.
Open SoundCloud Pulse app for Creators
Install SoundCloud Pulse app for Creators
Your subscription could not be verified
Want to listen offline and advert-free?
Discover more with our SoundCloud Go plans
Discover even more with SoundCloud Go+
Get the new SoundCloud Go today with offline and advert-free listening
Get offline listening, no adverts or previews, and the largest collection of streaming tracks anywhere on the planet
Unlock all previews and get access to more than 150M tracks from emerging and major label artists
Get it for a limited time
Looks like something went wrong. Please try again.

Offer limited to one %1$d day trial per user. After the first %2$d days, subscription renews automatically unless cancelled before the end of the %3$d day trial. Subscription may be cancelled at any time on soundcloud.com. All prices include applicable local sales taxes.\n\nResidents of Quebec, Canada are not eligible for trials due to local restrictions.

Either this subscription does not have a trial, you have already used your free trial or are a resident of Quebec and are not eligible for a trial due to local restrictions.\n\nBy purchasing a subscription, you will be charged the current regular price per month (including applicable local sales taxes) unless cancelled before your next renewal date.

Offer is only available for users that have not had a free trial. First %1$s of subscription for total of %2$s. If user does not cancel their subscription before the end of these %1$s, the subscription will auto-renew every month at a price of %3$s/month until user cancels.\n\nAd‑free is defined by the removal of interruptive audio and visual experiences.

Every time you see or hear an advert, artists get paid. They’re how we keep SoundCloud free for listeners.\n\nWant to lose the interruptions? Go advert‑free and continue to support your favourite artists with a subscription.
Something went wrong and we are unable to change your plan at this time. Please contact our community support team.
You are currently on an Apple iTunes Subscription. To be able to change plans, you need to first end your Apple iTunes Subscription in the App Store.
Discover, stream and share a constantly expanding mix of music from established and emerging artists
Access the world’s largest music streaming catalogue, a constantly expanding mix from established and emerging artists
Millions of premium SoundCloud Go+ tracks
There is already an active subscription
There was a problem trying to connect to the app store. Please try again.
There seems to be no valid app store on this device.
It seems that there is already an active subscription linked to your account.
Confirm your email address to purchase a subscription. Check your inbox for confirmation instructions.
We were unable to complete the purchase. Please try again.
Too much time has passed to validate your payment. If the problem persists, please contact our support team.
Your subscription is associated with a different SoundCloud account. Please make sure your SoundCloud account matches the subscription in your Google Play account.
We were unable to verify your payment. Please try again later.
Tap here to view storage settings
This will save your current and future likes offline so you can listen without Wi-Fi or data connection.
Your subscription could not be verified
Because this device has been offline for more than 30 days, we could not verify your subscription. To regain access to your offline content, connect to the internet with this device.
Tap here to change storage location
Tap the arrow to download your liked tracks to your device.
Your new subscription gives you access to these premium tracks.
Tap the arrow to download a playlist or album to your device.
Tap to change your offline listening and storage settings.
Things are a little different now, in a good way
All previews are now full tracks with SoundCloud Go+
Take your music with you. Tap the arrow to download for offline listening
Now nothing stands between you and the music
You now have access to more tracks than any other streaming service
There was a problem enabling your new features and content. Please restart the application.
Selecting this will save all your current and future likes, playlists and albums offline automatically.
Your subscription has ended.\n\nYou will no longer have offline and advert-free listening, and Go+ tracks are only playable as previews. Don’t worry, you can resubscribe any time.
You switched from SoundCloud Go+ to SoundCloud Go.\n\nYou’ll still have offline and advert-free listening, but Go+ tracks are only playable as previews. Don’t worry, you can switch back any time.
Turn this on to save all your current and future likes, playlists and albums offline.
Turn this off to stop saving automatically and remove anything previously saved offline.
When this is turned on, we will only save tracks offline over a Wi-Fi connection.
Offline content currently saves to your internal device storage.
Offline content currently saves to your SD card.
This will define how much of your available storage can be used for offline listening.
This will remove any content that is stored on the device.
You’re about to remove everything from offline listening.
You’re about to remove everything from offline listening. Additionally, your new likes, playlists and albums won’t save automatically anymore.
Limit cannot be set below current storage usage.
Signing out removes all offline tracks
The next time you sign in, you’ll be able to decide which tracks, playlists and albums should be saved again.
Your new likes, playlists and albums won’t save automatically anymore and existing saved sounds will be removed from offline listening.
You’re about to remove this from offline. Additionally, your newly created or liked playlists won’t save offline automatically anymore.
All current and future offline content will be downloaded to your internal device storage and removed from your SD card.
All current and future offline content will be downloaded to your SD card and removed from your internal device storage.
Re-insert your SD card or change your storage location to continue managing your offline content.

plurals.name: offline_dialog_go_online_warning_content
plurals.item: Your device needs to be online at least once every 30 days to verify your subscription. Get back online in %d day to keep the content you’ve saved offline accessible.
Your device needs to be online at least once every 30 days to verify your subscription. Get back online in %d days to keep the content you’ve saved offline accessible.

resources.string: You already have a subscription on three devices. If you register this device, we’ll automatically unregister the one you haven’t used the longest.
You already have offline listening on 10 devices. You need to sign out of one device before you can sign in on this one.

Since you’ve reached your subscription device limit, we’ve signed out this device and de-registered it. Anything you saved offline was removed. You need to sign in before you can re-register this device.
